name.title: The short name for the solution. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the NOX solution, application or service. This value is used extensively by the NOX tooling and libraries and should ideally be unique within an organisation.

description.title: A short description of the NOX solution.
description.description: A brief description of the solution with what it's purpose or goals are.

overview.title: URL to the documentation or specification of the solution.
overview.description: A URL which contains the requirements, documentation or specification for this solution.

variables.title: The environment variables used in your solution and default values.
variables.description: A key/value pair of environment variables used in your solution and their defaults.

name.title: A short name for the environment. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the run-time environment. Each environment name should be unique within a solution.

description.title: A short description of the run-time environment.
description.description: The description of the run-time environment. Try to include the purpose or use of the environment.

isProduction.title: Whether this environment is a production environment (true) or not (false).
isProduction.description: Specifies which environment(s) are used for production or not. Affects how devops processes and the NOX runtime is configured.

variables.title: The variables and values for this environment.
variables.description: A key/value pair of environment variables used in this environment and their defaults.

items.title: Definitions for run-time environments.
items.description: Definitions for the name, variables and other pertinent information pertaining to run-time environments.

environments.title: Definitions for run-time environments.
environments.description: Definitions for the name, variables and other pertinent information pertaining to run-time environments.

provider.title: The source code and repository provider or service.
provider.description: The name of of the provider or service for source code and version control.

host.title: The URI for the host of the version control service.
host.description: The URI for the person or organization's projects and reporitories. Usually https://dev.azure.com/<organization>

sourceCode.title: The path or relative path to the source code root.
sourceCode.description: The path or relative path that contains your source code. Allows auto-configuration of build pipelines.

tests.title: The path or relative path to the solution tests.
tests.description: The path or relative path that contains your solution tests. Allows auto-configuration of build pipelines.

containers.title: The path or relative path to the docker containers.
containers.description: The path or relative path that contains your solution docker containers.

samples.title: The path or relative path to the samples folder.
samples.description: The path or relative path that contains your solution samples.

docs.title: The path or relative path to the solution documentation.
docs.description: The path or relative path that contains your solution documentation.

name.title: The name and surname of the team member.
name.description: The name and surname of the member in the team.

userName.title: The version control and organizational user name for the user.
userName.description: The user name/email for the user on Github, Azure Devops or another source versioning platform

name.title: The name of the entity. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the abstract or real-world entity. It should be a commonly used singular noun and be unique within a solution.

description.title: A phrase describing the entity.
description.description: A description of the entity and what it represents in the real world.

pluralName.title: The pluraly name of the entity. Contains no spaces
pluralName.description: The name for a set, group or collection of the entity. NOX will guess the plural if it is not supplied.

icon.title: An icon that distinctly and visually represents the entity
icon.description: An optional icon that represents the entity as a key or in SVG format. It can be a URI that points to a resource countaining the SVG data.

userInterface.title: Specifies information on displaying the entity on a user interface
userInterface.description: Provides hints to rendering engines as to how this entity should be managed in the user interface.

isVersioned.title: Whether all changes to this entity is tracked fo versioning and auditing.
isVersioned.description: Indicates to the storage engine that all changes to this entity must be tracked over time. Usually used to time-travel, track or audit an entity's state changes.

persistence.title: Specifies information on storing and retrieving entities
persistence.description: Provides hints to the database engine and API as to how this entity should be managed in the persistence store.

name.title: The name of the relationship. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the relationship, usually in the format EntityRelationshipTargetEntity. Eg "CountryHasCapitalCity".

description.title: A phrase describing the relationship with the target entity.
description.description: A phrase that describes the relationship of the form <entity> <phrase> <targetEntity>. Eg. "has capital" like in <Country> <has capital> <City>

relationship.title: The type/cardinality of the relationship.
relationship.description: The cardinality (type) of relationship with the target entity.

entity.title: The target entity that relates to this entity.
entity.description: The name of the target entity that this entity relates to.

items.title: Defines relationships to other entities.
items.description: Defines one way relationships to other entities. Remember to define the reverse relationship on the target entities.

relationships.title: Defines relationships to other entities.
relationships.description: Defines one way relationships to other entities. Remember to define the reverse relationship on the target entities.

name.title: The name of the relationship. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the relationship, usually in the format EntityRelationshipTargetEntity. Eg "CountryHasCapitalCity".

description.title: A phrase describing the relationship with the target entity.
description.description: A "phrase" part that describes the relationship of the form <entity> <phrase> <targetEntity>. Eg. "has capital" like in <Country> <has capital> <City>

relationship.title: The type/cardinality of the relationship.
relationship.description: The cardinality (type) of relationship with the target entity.

entity.title: The target entity that relates to this entity.
entity.description: The name of the target entity that this entity relates to.

items.title: Defines owned relationships to another entity.
items.description: Defines relationship to owned entities. This entity will be treated as an aggregate root.

ownedRelationships.title: Defines owned relationships to another entity.
ownedRelationships.description: Defines relationship to owned entities. This entity will be treated as an aggregate root.

name.title: The name of the relationship. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the query, usually in the format Get<x>by<y>. Eg "GetCapitalCitiesByContinent".

description.title: A phrase describing the realtionship with the target entity.
description.description: A phrase that describes the relationship of the form <entity> <phrase> <targetEntity>. Eg. "has capital" like in <Country> <has capital> <City>.

collectionTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
collectionTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

arrayTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
arrayTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

collectionTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
collectionTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

arrayTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
arrayTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

items.title: Defines queries for the domain.
items.description: Defines queries for the domain that operates on this entity. Queries should have no side effects and not mutate the domain state.

queries.title: Defines queries for the domain.
queries.description: Defines queries for the domain that operates on this entity. Queries should have no side effects and not mutate the domain state.

collectionTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
collectionTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

arrayTypeOptions.title: Defines the request parameters for a domain query.
arrayTypeOptions.description: The ordered parameters that is the input for the requested query. Can contain simple or complex types

items.title: Defines commands for the domain.
items.description: Defines commands for the domain that operates on this entity. Commands may have side effects and mutate the domain state.

commands.title: Defines commands for the domain.
commands.description: Defines commands for the domain that operates on this entity. Commands may have side effects and mutate the domain state.

items.title: The entities that describes the domain.
items.description: The collection of entitties and their relationships with each other.

entities.title: The entities that describes the domain.
entities.description: The collection of entitties and their relationships with each other.

title: Fully describes a NOX solution
description: Contains all configuration, domain objects and infrastructure declarations that defines a NOX solution. See https://noxorg.dev for more.
